Name: GYATM Dragon Edition
About the game: You are the first person on Mars. You will need to establish a base, mine resources, and build everything the colonists will need to survive. It's one person against a harsh and unforgiving planet where everything we take for granted is in short supply. The colony ship is on the way. Thousands of lives depend on you!
